ModMetaData.name: Muffalo-in-a-Box
ModMetaData.author: Tired Guy
ModMetaData.description: Need a way to easily store mechanoids and animals when they aren't needed? Want to trade them over multiplayer mods to other players? This is the mod for you! Code was done by "Thekiborg" and artwork was done by "BlackMarket420". They were both commissioned for their work and I highly recommend them both! I'll update the description if more details are requested. I primarily had this mod made for all the cool gamer people using Phinix, but its not required to use this mod. Store your boomrats and militors for a rainy, or NOT rainy day!
